name: Iterum
description:
ITERUM is a first person singleplayer puzzle game. Inspired by games like Antichamber, it plays with morphing rooms and unorthodox puzzles.

The estimated playtime is around 20 minutes but may vary extremely :D
Get the fun for free and give a buck if you like what you got ;)

Two versions are available, Non-VR and experimental VR.
Non-VR (this one) can be played with keyboard and mouse or gamepad.

I would love to hear about your experience and I also want to know your ( honest ;-) ) playtime.
_____________________________
Link to VR version: Iterum VR
